texts.definition: The goal of eliminating a whole team from gameplay.
markups: <style="Definition">The goal of eliminating a whole team from gameplay.</style>
<style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> is the goal to remove all members of a team from gameplay.

One way to win matches in the <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Counter-Strike%20series">Counter-Strike series</link></style> is to kill all members in the other <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style>.

Making <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> possible is a way to modify how <style="Link"><link="teams">Teams</link></style> work in <style="Link"><link="multiplayer-games">Multiplayer Games</link></style>. The main way of allowing <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> in games is through having <style="Link"><link="eliminate">Eliminate</link></style> goals for all members of a <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style>. In the case of <style="Link"><link="teams">Teams</link></style> consisting of players, this means using <style="Link"><link="player-elimination">Player Elimination</link></style> but when <style="Link"><link="teams">Teams</link></style> consist of <style="Link"><link="characters">Characters</link></style> the successful completion of <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> can result in  <style="Link"><link="player-elimination">Player Elimination</link></style> of the player controlling that <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style> instead. Since this allows <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> to be viewed as a <style="Link"><link="collections">Collection</link></style> of <style="Link"><link="eliminate">Eliminate</link></style> goals, so designing such goals is one way to encourage <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> if it is possible to <style="Link"><link="eliminate">Eliminate</link></style> the <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style> members. The possibility to cause <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> can be a <style="Link"><link="mutual-goals">Mutual Goal</link></style> for other <style="Link"><link="teams">Teams</link></style>.

The presence of <style="Link"><link="spawning">Spawning</link></style> making <style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> impossible since new <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style> members continuously enter gameplay.

<style="CurrentLink">Team Elimination</style> is a <style="Link"><link="shared-penalties">Shared Penalty</link></style> between also those in a <style="Link"><link="teams">Team</link></style> can be cause <style="Link"><link="game-over">Game Over</link></style> for them. In some cases they can lead to <style="Link"><link="spectacular-failure-enjoyment">Spectacular Failure Enjoyment</link></style>.
